Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000. Combo Action: Spinning Edge ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 7,000. Combo Action: Gust Slash ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000. Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage. Can only be executed while under the effect of Hidden. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 4,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Damage over time Potency: 4,000 Duration: 12s Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 8,000. Maximum Charges: 3 This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions. ※Action changes to Hyosho Ranryu while under the effect of Three Mudra.
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 16,000. Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Grants Three Mudra, allowing for immediate execution of any ninjutsu action. However, the same ninjutsu action cannot be executed consecutively. Duration: 10s Maximum Charges: 2 ※Action changes to Meisui while under the effect of Three Mudra. ※All actions except Seiton Tenchu will change to their respective ninjutsu actions while under the effect of Three Mudra.

Restores own or target party member's HP. Cure Potency: 8,000 Additional Effect: Grants healing over time effect to target Cure Potency: 4,000 Duration: 12s Additional Effect: Nullifies one status affliction that can be removed by Purify Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000. Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10% Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Fuma Shuriken by 10 seconds ※Action changes to Goka Mekkyaku while under the effect of Three Mudra.

Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000. Additional Effect: Stun Duration: 2s Additional Effect: Grants Fleeting Raiju Ready Duration: 10s Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra. Cannot be executed while bound. ※Aeolian Edge Combo changes to Fleeting Raiju while under the effect of Fleeting Raiju Ready. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Grants 5 stacks of Bunshin, each stack allowing your shadow to attack enemies each time you execute a weaponskill. Bunshin Potency: 4,000 Potency is halved when executing Fuma Shuriken, Zesho Meppo, Forked Raiju, or Fleeting Raiju. Duration: 20s Additional Effect: Grants Shade Shift, creating a shadow that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency Duration: 10s ※Action changes to Huton while under the effect of Three Mudra.

Grants Huton, creating a barrier that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 16,000 potency. While barrier is active, reduces weaponskill recast time by 20%, and increases movement speed by 25%. Duration: 10s Movement speed returns to normal when barrier is completely absorbed. Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Move quickly to the specified location. Additional Effect: Grants Hidden Hidden Effect: Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for enemies to see or target you Duration: 4s Effect ends upon use of any action or upon taking damage from an enemy. Cannot be executed while bound. ※Action changes to Doton while under the effect of Three Mudra. ※Aeolian Edge Combo changes to Assassinate while under the effect of Hidden.

Creates a patch of corrupted earth under your feet, dealing damage with a potency of 3,000 to any enemies who enter. Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Reduces damage taken by 15% while standing in the patch of salted earth Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000, incapacitating foes whose HP is below 50%. Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Death Link Duration: 2s Defeating an enemy with this action, or one under the effect of Death Link, will grant Unsealed Seiton Tenchu, allowing a second execution of this action. Duration: 8s Effect duration is reduced by 1s each time it is applied to a target with a minimum duration of 4s. Effect cannot be applied to players riding machina or non-player combatants. Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full or while under the effect of Unsealed Seiton Tenchu. Gauge Charge Time: 90s Cannot be executed while bound.

Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000, incapacitating foes whose HP is below 50%. Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Death Link Duration: 2s Defeating an enemy with this action, or one under the effect of Death Link, will grant Unsealed Seiton Tenchu, allowing a second execution of this action. Duration: 8s Effect duration is reduced by 1s each time it is applied to a target with a minimum duration of 4s. Effect cannot be applied to players riding machina or non-player combatants. Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full or while under the effect of Unsealed Seiton Tenchu. Gauge Charge Time: 90s Cannot be executed while bound.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000. ※Action changes to Hyosetsu while under the effect of Kaiten. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000. Combo Action: Yukikaze or Hyosetsu ※Action changes to Mangetsu while under the effect of Kaiten. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000. Combo Action: Gekko or Mangetsu ※Action changes to Oka while under the effect of Kaiten. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000 to all nearby enemies. Additional Effect: Bind Duration: 2s Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies. Combo Action: Yukikaze or Hyosetsu Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies. Combo Action: Gekko or Mangetsu Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 16,000. Can only be executed while under the effect of Midare. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a cone before you. Potency is increased to 12,000 when attacking only a single target. Additional Effect: When attacking two or more targets, creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 9,000 potency Duration: 10s This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions. ※Action changes to Kaeshi: Namikiri upon execution.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a cone before you. Potency is increased to 12,000 when attacking only a single target. Combo Action: Ogi Namikiri Additional Effect: When attacking two or more targets, creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 9,000 potency Duration: 10s ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Swiftly charges forward, dealing damage with a potency of 3,000 to targets in your path. Additional Effect: Grants Kaiten Duration: 10s Maximum Charges: 3 Cannot be executed while bound. ※Yukikaze changes to Hyosetsu while under the effect of Kaiten. ※Gekko changes to Mangetsu while under the effect of Kaiten. ※Kasha changes to Oka while under the effect of Kaiten.

Reduces damage taken by 33% and delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000 every time you suffer damage. Duration: 4s Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Kuzushi Kuzushi Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 25% Duration: 4s Additional Effect: Grants Zanshin Ready Duration: 10s ※Action changes to Zanshin upon execution.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Debana Debana Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 15% Duration: 4s Extends Kuzushi duration by 4s to a maximum of 6s. Effect cannot be stacked with Kuzushi when extending its duration. Additional Effect: Stun Duration: 2s

Grants Meikyo Shisui. Meikyo Shisui Effect: Nullifies status afflictions that can be removed by Purify, as well as knockback and draw-in effects Duration: 3s Additional Effect: Grants Tendo Setsugekka Ready Duration: 10s ※Action changes to Tendo Setsugekka upon execution.

Swiftly charges forward, dealing damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 24,000. If target is afflicted with Kuzushi, deals damage equal to 100% of their maximum HP. Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage. The additional effect of Kuzushi cannot be applied to players riding machina and non-player combatants. Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full. Gauge Charge Time: 120s Cannot be executed while bound.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000. Combo Action: Slice ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 7,000. Combo Action: Waxing Slice ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000. Additional Effect: Grants Gallows Oiled Duration: 10s Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver. ※Infernal Slice Combo changes to Gallows while under the effect of Gallows Oiled and Soul Reaver. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000. Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver and Gallows Oiled. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000. Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded. This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000. Combo Action: Void Reaping Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded. This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Potency increases up to 12,000 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 50% HP or less. Additional Effect: Absorbs 50% of damage dealt as HP Maximum Charges: 2 This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you. Potency increases up to 24,000 based on your accumulated stacks of Immortal Sacrifice, gained by executing Executioner's Guillotine, KOing enemies, or earning assists. Consumes all stacks of Immortal Sacrifice upon execution. Can only be executed while not under the effect of Enshrouded. This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 4,000 to all enemies in a cone before you. Additional Effect: Grants Executioner's Guillotine Ready Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Heavy +75% Duration: 3s ※Infernal Slice Combo changes to Executioner's Guillotine upon execution.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000 to all enemies in a cone before you. Additional Effect: Bind Duration: 3s Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Afflicts target with Death Warrant, causing you to compile damage you deal to that target. Action is changed to Fate Sealed for the duration of the effect. Deals damage when time expires or upon executing Fate Sealed. Duration: 8s Damage Potency: 2,000 plus 50% of compiled damage

Quickly dash 15 yalms forward. Additional Effect: Leaves behind a Hellsgate at point of origin, and grants Threshold to self Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Increases movement speed by 25% Duration: 5s Cannot be executed while bound. ※Action changes to Regress upon execution.
Move instantly to the Hellsgate left behind by you. Cannot be executed while bound. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Grants Crest of Time Borrowed to self, creating a barrier that nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 12,000 potency. Duration: 10s Grants the Crest of Time Returned to self and nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms when barrier is completely absorbed. Crest of Time Returned Effect: Gradually restores HP Cure Potency: 6,000 Duration: 6s

Offers your flesh as a vessel to your avatar, gaining 5 stacks of Enshrouded. Duration: 20s Additional Effect: Afflicts nearby enemies with Hysteria Hysteria Effect: Afflicted enemies are unable to act of their own free will Duration: 2s Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full. Gauge Charge Time: 60s Has no effect on players riding machina or non-player combatants. ※Action changes to Communio while under the effect of Enshrouded. ※Grim Swathe changes to Lemure's Slice while under the effect of Enshrouded. ※Infernal Slice Combo changes to Void Reaping while under the effect of Enshrouded.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 16,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Grants Perfectio Parata Duration: 15s Requires at least one stack of Enshrouded. Consumes all stacks of Enshrouded upon execution. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar. ※Action changes to Perfectio upon execution.

All enemies standing in the corrupted earth of Doton take additional earth damage with a potency of 3,000. Requires the execution of a weaponskill, Hyosho Ranryu, or Goka Mekkyaku. Additional Effect: Heavy +75% Duration: 3s ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000. Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Immortal Sacrifice, up to a maximum of 8 Maximum Charges: 2 This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Instantly return to this sanctuary's cozy cabin.

Deals fire damage with a potency of 6,000. Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Ice. Additional Effect: Grants Paradox Duration: 15s ※Action changes to Fire III upon execution.

Deals fire damage with a potency of 10,000. Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Ice. Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire II. ※Action changes to High Fire II upon execution. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals fire damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Ice. Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Resonance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals fire damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and 8,000 to all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with a stack of Astral Warmth, up to a maximum of 3 Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Freeze. Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Resonance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals ice damage with a potency of 4,500. Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Fire. Additional Effect: Grants Paradox Duration: 15s ※Action changes to Blizzard III upon execution.

Deals ice damage with a potency of 7,500. Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Fire. Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice II. ※Action changes to High Blizzard II upon execution. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals ice damage with a potency of 9,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Fire. Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Resonance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals ice damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and 8,000 to all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with a stack of Umbral Freeze, up to a maximum of 3 Duration: 15s Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Warmth. Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Resonance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals lightning damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 15,000. Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 15,000 potency Duration: 10s This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000. Additional Effect: Absorbs 100% of damage dealt as HP Potency is reduced to 8,000 when your HP is below 50%, but absorbs 200% of damage dealt as HP. Maximum Charges: 2 This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Afflicts target and all enemies nearby it with Half-asleep. Duration: 3s Half-asleep Effect: Targets succumb to Sleep when effect expires Duration: 3s Targets struck while under the effect of Sleep will take additional damage with a potency of 8,000, and effect will dissipate.

Rush to a target's side.
Cannot be executed while bound.

Deals damage to nearby enemies with a potency of 3,000 up to a maximum of 9,000 for every stack of Astral Warmth or Umbral Freeze they have accumulated. Additional Effect: Enemies under the effect of Astral Warmth are afflicted with Burns, dealing fire damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 6s Duration increases by 3s for each additional stack of Astral Warmth, up to a maximum of 12s. Additional Effect: Enemies under the effect of Umbral Freeze are afflicted with a status ailment commensurate with the number of stacks accumulated 1 Stack: Heavy 2 Stacks: Bind 3 Stacks: Deep Freeze Duration: 2s Maximum Charges: 2

Grants 6 stacks of Soul Resonance, upgrading Fire to Flare and Blizzard to Freeze. Duration: 30s Additional Effect: Grants Elemental Star Elemental Star Effect: Action changes to Flare Star while under the effect of Astral Fire, or Frost Star while under the effect of Umbral Ice Duration: 30s Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full. Gauge Charge Time: 60s

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 9,000. Additional Effect: Increases your stacks of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice to maximum Duration: 15s Can only be executed while under the effect of Paradox. This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000. ※Action changes to Ruin IV while under the effect of Further Ruin. ※Action changes to Astral Impulse while under the effect of Dreadwyrm Trance. ※Action changes to Fountain of Fire while under the effect of Firebird Trance.
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000. Can only be executed while under the effect of Dreadwyrm Trance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Deals fire damage with a potency of 6,000. Can only be executed while under the effect of Firebird Trance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Rushes forward and delivers a fire attack with a potency of 6,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Grants Crimson Strike Ready Duration: 10s Cannot be executed while bound. ※Action changes to Crimson Strike upon execution.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 for the first enemy, and 8,000 for all remaining enemies. Additional Effect: 5-yalm knockback emanating from first target Can only be executed while under the effect of Crimson Strike Ready. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals wind damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Damage over time Potency: 4,000 Duration: 6s Additional Effect: Increases movement speed of self and party members standing near the target by 25% Duration: 6s This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Creates a barrier around self or target party member that reduces damage taken by 25% and absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 12,000 potency. Duration: 10s
Deals earth damage with a potency of 12,000 to all enemies in a cone before you. Additional Effect: Stun Duration: 2s This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 4,000. Potency increases up to 8,000 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 50% HP or less. Maximum Charges: 2

Enters Dreadwyrm Trance and summons Demi-Bahamut to fight at a designated location. Duration: 20s Demi-Bahamut will execute Megaflare upon being summoned, then execute Wyrmwave automatically, prioritizing targets with the lowest HP within 30 yalms. Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full. Gauge Charge Time: 90s ※Action changes to Deathflare upon execution. ※Ruin III changes to Astral Impulse while under the effect of Dreadwyrm Trance.
Orders Demi-Bahamut to execute Akh Morn. Akh Morn Effect: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 20,000 to all nearby enemies.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Enters Firebird Trance and summons Demi-Phoenix to fight at a designated location. Duration: 20s Demi-Phoenix will execute Everlasting Flight upon being summoned, then execute Scarlet Flame automatically, prioritizing the closest target within 30 yalms that is not afflicted with Scarlet Flame. Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full. Gauge Charge Time: 90s ※Action changes to Brand of Purgatory upon execution. ※Ruin III changes to Fountain of Fire while under the effect of Firebird Trance.

Orders Demi-Phoenix to execute Revelation. Revelation Effect: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000 to target and all enemies nearby it Additional Effect: Damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 15s ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Gradually restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members. Cure Potency: 4,000 Duration: 18s Additional Effect: Restores HP when HP falls below 25% or upon effect duration expiration Cure Potency: 16,000 ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Deals fire damage with a potency of 4,000. Additional Effect: Damage over time Potency: 4,000 Duration: 6s ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 15s ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals earth damage with a potency of 5,000. Additional Effect: Grants Dualcast, allowing next spell to be cast immediately Duration: 10s Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift. ※Action changes to Veraero III while under the effect of Dualcast. ※Action changes to Verfire while under the effect of Black Shift. ※Action changes to Verthunder III while under the effect of Black Shift and Dualcast.
Deals wind damage with a potency of 5,000. Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift and Dualcast. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Additional Effect: Restores own HP Cure Potency: 8,000 Additional Effect: Restores HP of party members near target Cure Potency: 8,000 Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift and Vermilion Radiance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals fire damage with a potency of 5,000. Additional Effect: Grants Dualcast, allowing next spell to be cast immediately Duration: 10s Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 5,000. Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift and Dualcast. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals fire damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it. Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift and Vermilion Radiance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000. White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy Black Shift Effect: Damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 6s ※Action changes to Enchanted Zwerchhau upon execution.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 7,000. Combo Action: Enchanted Riposte White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy Black Shift Effect: Damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 6s ※Action changes to Enchanted Redoublement upon execution. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000. Combo Action: Enchanted Zwerchhau Additional Effect: Grants Vermilion Radiance Duration: 10s White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy Black Shift Effect: Damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 6s ※Action changes to Verholy while under the effect of White Shift and Vermilion Radiance. ※Action changes to Verflare while under the effect of Black Shift and Vermilion Radiance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000. White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy Black Shift Effect: Damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 6s ※Action changes to Enchanted Zwerchhau upon execution.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 7,000. Combo Action: Enchanted Riposte White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy Black Shift Effect: Damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 6s ※Action changes to Enchanted Redoublement upon execution. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000. Combo Action: Enchanted Zwerchhau Additional Effect: Grants Vermilion Radiance Duration: 10s White Shift Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Barrier potency is increased by 10% when target is afflicted with Monomachy Black Shift Effect: Damage over time Potency: 3,000 Duration: 6s ※Action changes to Verholy while under the effect of White Shift and Vermilion Radiance. ※Action changes to Verflare while under the effect of Black Shift and Vermilion Radiance. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you. White Shift Effect: Silence Duration: 2s Black Shift Effect: Bind Duration: 3s This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you. White Shift Effect: Silence Duration: 2s Black Shift Effect: Bind Duration: 3s This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%, while increasing HP recovered via healing actions by 10%. Duration: 10s Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift. Shares a recast timer with Frazzle. ※Action changes to Frazzle while under the effect of Black Shift.

Increases damage taken by nearby enemies by 10%, while reducing HP recovered via healing actions by 10%. Duration: 10s Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift. Shares a recast timer with Magick Barrier. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000. Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Monomachy Monomachy Effect: Increases damage dealt to target by 10% while lowering damage taken from target by 10% Duration: 8s Maximum Charges: 2 Cannot be executed while bound.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000. Additional Effect: 15-yalm backstep Additional Effect: Increases damage and healing potency of next spell cast by 15% Duration: 10s Maximum Charges: 2 Cannot be executed while bound.
Grants Black Shift, altering the effects of several actions. Can only be executed while under the effect of White Shift. ※Action changes to White Shift upon execution.

Grants White Shift, altering the effects of several actions. Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Shift. Activates automatically when class is changed to red mage. ※Action changes to Black Shift upon execution. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Emblazons a grand cross on the ground beneath a party member or enemy, restoring HP of party members within range while damaging enemies. Cure Potency: 8,000 Damage Potency: 8,000 White Shift Effect: Cure potency is increased by 50% Black Shift Effect: Damage potency is increased by 50% Targets standing at the cross's center will receive the effects of this action twice. Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full. Gauge Charge Time: 90s

Emblazons a grand cross on the ground beneath a party member or enemy, restoring HP of party members within range while damaging enemies. Cure Potency: 8,000 Damage Potency: 8,000 White Shift Effect: Cure potency is increased by 50% Black Shift Effect: Damage potency is increased by 50% Targets standing at the cross's center will receive the effects of this action twice. Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full. Gauge Charge Time: 90s

Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000. Additional Effect: Stun Duration: 2s Can only be executed while under the effect of Fleeting Raiju Ready. Cannot be executed while bound. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Restores own HP. Cure Potency: 15,000
Increases target's damage taken by 10%. Duration: 10s Halves the defensive bonus of Guard when targeting enemies under its effect.
Unleashes an energetic blast of lightning.

Unleashes an energetic blast of lightning.
※Has no effect in battle.

Weave a miraculous illusion of seasonal whimsy.
※Has no effect in battle.

Restores target's HP. Cure Potency: 14,000 Additional Effect: Regen Cure Potency: 4,200 Duration: 15s Additional Effect: Cure potency is doubled when target is under the effect of Rehabilitation This action is not affected by attributes.

Provoke nearby enemies, placing yourself at the top of their enmity list while gaining additional enmity. Additional Effect: Stun Duration: 4s Additional Effect: Significantly increases enmity generation Duration: 60s

Resurrects target to a weakened state.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Furthermore, the recast timer cannot be affected by other actions.
Deals damage over time to target and all enemies nearby it. Potency: 2,040 Duration: 30s This action is not affected by attributes or enhancing effects.
Reduces damage taken by 20%. Duration: 60s Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 21,000 potency Duration: 8s
Resurrects target to a weakened state. Resurrection restrictions do not apply.

Reduces damage taken by 90% and grants immunity to Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, and knockback and draw-in effects. Duration: 4s Movement speed is reduced by 33% for the duration of this effect. Effect ends upon reuse, using another action, or when the effect duration expires.

Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies. Inner Release Potency: 12,000 Can only be executed while under the effect of Chaotic Cyclone Ready. ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies. Additional Effect: Absorbs 100% of damage dealt as HP This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you. Consumes 12,000 HP when executed. Additional Effect: Grants Blackblood Duration: 10s Can only be executed when current HP is above 12,000 or while under the effect of Dark Arts. ※Souleater Combo changes to Scarlet Delirium while under the effect of Blackblood. ※Souleater Combo changes to Comeuppance while under the effect of Comeuppance Ready. ※Souleater Combo changes to Torcleaver while under the effect of Torcleaver Ready.
Reduces damage taken by self or target and nearby party members by 10%. Duration: 15s ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, as well as spell cast time and recast time for self or target and nearby party members by 10%, while also increasing movement speed by 25%. Duration: 15s ※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
